law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 13, effective March 16, 2005. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 479, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1993 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 4, effective September 16, 1993. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 262, sec. 1.
